situation.title: Trainings - business
situation.meta_description: It is not possible to attend full-time training or other similar training events for employees at the moment. However, you can be educated using remote forms of training.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

It is not possible to attend full-time training or other similar training events for employees at the moment. However, you can be educated using remote forms of training.

questions_answers.question: Can I attend the training in person?
